timeline.message:
Addressed comments on ZK scaling procedures

Signed-off-by: Thomas Cooper <tcooper@redhat.com>

Added logic to prevent ZK cluster roll when scaling 3.5.x clusters

    * Updated settings to allow ZK 3.5.x cluster reconfiguration
    * Switched ZK reconfig settings to be forbidden
    * Made the ZK config gen script support 3.4.x and 3.5.x config
      format
    * Added annotation to signal that the user has finished manual
      scaling
    * Refactored zkScaleUpInSmallSteps to zkScalingSetup and added status updates
    * Added logic to fail (with status) the reconciliation zk scale of more than one is set
    * Added ZK 3.5.x scaling procedures document

Note: This commit will require manual user intervention to scale a 3.5.x
cluster.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Cooper <tcooper@redhat.com>
